original_text: When the king of Moab saw that the battle had gone against him, he took with him seven hundred swordsmen to break through to the king of Edom, but they failed.
korean_text: 모압 왕이 전세가 극렬하여 당하기 어려움을 보고 칼찬 군사 칠백 명을 거느리고 돌파하여 지나서 에돔 왕에게로 가고자 하되 가지 못하고

sentences.original_text: When the king of Moab saw
that the battle had gone against him
he took with him seven hundred swordsmen
to break through to the king of Edom
